001package reciprocal.linear.matrix;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.hash;
005import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
006import static org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate.noNullElements;
007
008import java.util.Comparator;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.stream.Stream;
011import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
012import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
013import reciprocal.linear.vector.AbstractVector;
014
015/**
016 * Base class for matrices
017 *
018 * @param <E> element
019 * @param <V> vector
020 * @param <M> matrix
021 * @param <N> norm
022 * @since 0.0.1
023 */
024public abstract class AbstractMatrix<E extends Number, V extends AbstractVector<E, V, N>, M extends AbstractMatrix<E, V, M, N>, N extends Number> {
025    private final @NotNull List<@NotNull MatrixEntry<@NotNull E>> entries;
026
027    /**
028     * Constructor
029     *
030     * @param rowSize row size
031     * @param columnSize column size
032     * @param entries entries
033     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code rowSize < 1}
034     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code columnSize < 1}
035     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code entries == null}
036     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when one entry in entries is null
037     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code rowIndex < 1 || size < rowIndex} for one row index
038     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code columnIndex < 1 || size < columnIndex} for one column index
039     * @since 0.0.1
040     */
041    protected AbstractMatrix(final int rowSize, final int columnSize,
042        final @NotNull List<@NotNull MatrixEntry<@NotNull E>> entries) {
043        checkArgument(rowSize > 0, "expected rowSize > 0 but rowSize = %s", rowSize);
044        checkArgument(columnSize > 0, "expected columnSize > 0 but columnSize = %s", columnSize);
045        requireNonNull(entries, "entries");
046        noNullElements(entries, "all entries expected not to be null but entries = %s", entries);
047        final var rowIndices = entries.stream().map(MatrixEntry::rowIndex).sorted().toList();
048        final var expectedRowIndices = Stream.iterate(1, i -> i + 1).limit(rowSize).toList();
049        checkArgument(rowIndices.equals(expectedRowIndices), "rowIndices == (1..%s) expected but rowIndices = %s",
050            rowSize, rowIndices);
051        final var columnIndices = entries.stream().map(MatrixEntry::columnIndex).sorted().toList();
052        final var expectedColumnIndices = Stream.iterate(1, i -> i + 1).limit(columnSize).toList();
053        checkArgument(rowIndices.equals(expectedColumnIndices),
054            "columnIndices == (1..%s) expected but columnIndices = %s", columnSize, columnIndices);
055        this.entries = entries.stream().sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(MatrixEntry::rowIndex))
056            .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(MatrixEntry::columnIndex)).toList();
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * Indicates if {@code this} is square
061     *
062     * @return {@link Boolean}
063     * @since 0.0.1
064     */
065    public final boolean isSquare() {
066        return getRowSize() == getColumnSize();
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Indicates if {@code this} is triangular
071     *
072     * @return {@link Boolean}
073     * @since 0.0.1
074     */
075    public final boolean isTriangular() {
076        return isUpperTriangular() || isLowerTriangular();
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Indicates if {@code this} is upper triangular
081     *
082     * @return {@link Boolean}
083     * @since 0.0.1
084     */
085    public abstract boolean isUpperTriangular();
086
087    /**
088     * Indicates if {@code this} is lower triangular
089     *
090     * @return {@link Boolean}
091     * @since 0.0.1
092     */
093    public abstract boolean isLowerTriangular();
094
095    /**
096     * Indicates if {@code this} is diagonal
097     *
098     * @return {@link Boolean}
099     * @since 0.0.1
100     */
101    public final boolean isDiagonal() {
102        return isUpperTriangular() && isLowerTriangular();
103    }
104
105    /**
106     * Indicates if {@code this} is identity
107     *
108     * @return {@link Boolean}
109     * @since 0.0.1
110     */
111    public abstract boolean isIdentity();
112
113    /**
114     * Indicates if {@code this} is invertible
115     *
116     * @return {@link Boolean}
117     * @since 0.0.1
118     */
119    public abstract boolean isInvertible();
120
121    /**
122     * Indicates if {@code this} is symmetric
123     *
124     * @return {@link Boolean}
125     * @since 0.0.1
126     */
127    public final boolean isSymmetric() {
128        return isSquare() && equalsByComparing(transpose());
129    }
130
131    /**
132     * Indicates if {@code this} is skew symmetric
133     *
134     * @return {@link Boolean}
135     * @since 0.0.1
136     */
137    public final boolean isSkewSymmetric() {
138        return isSquare() && equalsByComparing(transpose());
139    }
140
141    /**
142     * Row indices
143     *
144     * @return row indices
145     * @since 0.0.1
146     */
147    public final @NotNull Stream<@NotNull Integer> getRowIndices() {
148        return entries.stream().map(MatrixEntry::rowIndex).distinct();
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Column indices
153     *
154     * @return column indices
155     * @since 0.0.1
156     */
157    public final @NotNull Stream<@NotNull Integer> getColumnIndices() {
158        return entries.stream().map(MatrixEntry::columnIndex).distinct();
159    }
160
161    /**
162     * Elements
163     *
164     * @return elements
165     * @since 0.0.1
166     */
167    public final @NotNull Stream<@NotNull E> getElements() {
168        return entries.stream().map(MatrixEntry::element);
169    }
170
171    /**
172     * Entries
173     *
174     * @return entries
175     */
176    public final @NotNull Stream<@NotNull MatrixEntry<@NotNull E>> getEntries() {
177        return entries.stream();
178    }
179
180    /**
181     * Diagonal elements
182     *
183     * @return diagonal elements
184     * @since 0.0.1
185     */
186    public final @NotNull Stream<@NotNull E> getDiagonalElements() {
187        return entries.stream().filter(e -> e.rowIndex() == e.columnIndex()).map(MatrixEntry::element);
188    }
189
190    /**
191     * Row size
192     *
193     * @return row size
194     * @since 0.0.1
195     */
196    public final int getRowSize() {
197        return getRowIndices().toList().size();
198    }
199
200    /**
201     * Column size
202     *
203     * @return column size
204     * @since 0.0.1
205     */
206    public final int getColumnSize() {
207        return getColumnIndices().toList().size();
208    }
209
210    /**
211     * Calculates the negated
212     *
213     * @return negated
214     * @since 0.0.1
215     */
216    public abstract @NotNull M negate();
217
218    /**
219     * Calculates the transpose
220     *
221     * @return transpose
222     * @since 0.0.1
223     */
224    public abstract @NotNull M transpose();
225
226    /**
227     * Returns if {@code this} is equal to other by comparing
228     *
229     * @param other other
230     * @return {@link Boolean}
231     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code other == null}
232     * @since 0.0.1
233     */
234    public abstract boolean equalsByComparing(@NotNull M other);
235
236    @Override
237    public final int hashCode() {
238        return hash(entries);
239    }
240
241    @Override
242    public final boolean equals(final @Nullable Object obj) {
243        if (this == obj) {
244            return true;
245        }
246        if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
247            return false;
248        }
249        return entries.equals(((AbstractMatrix<?, ?, ?, ?>) obj).getEntries().toList());
250    }
251
252    @Override
253    public final @NotNull String toString() {
254        return getClass().getSimpleName() + "{entries=" + entries + "}";
255    }
256}
